description:
Riot Games faced a big challenge when it started thinking about bringing its hit tactical shooter, Valorant, to console. The essential part was maintaining the same feel that Valorant has on PC so that, regardless of the machine you're playing on, you're getting what Riot considers to be the definitive Valorant experience. Because of the major differences between PC and console inputs--specifically the fact that playing a shooter with a mouse and playing a shooter with a controller require completely separate skill sets--that meant Riot had to adapt the console experience to make the two feel as similar as possible.

Ahead of the announcement of a Valorant console edition at Summer Game Fest 2024, Riot invited journalists and influencers to its studio in Los Angeles to play the new version, both to show the game off to the community and to gather feedback from Valorant die-hards to make sure it felt
title: Valorant On Controller Could Feel As Good As Mouse And Keyboard

description:
Sega revealed a new trailer for Sonic X Shadow Generations during the main showcase for Summer Game Fest. The trailer announced that the game will launch on October 25.

As seen in the trailer, Sonic X Shadow Generations includes both a remaster of Sonic Generations and a brand-new story-driven campaign in which you play as Shadow the Hedgehog. This new adventure will see Shadow go up against an old nemesis, Black Doom, as well as familiar foes from previous games.

In the Sonic Generations half of the game, you play as two different versions of the titular hedgehog: the old-school Sonic who runs through 2D levels and the more modern Sonic who sprints through 3D environments. This remastered version of the game features upgraded visuals to both the 2D and 3D levels,
title: Sonic X Shadow Generations Is Coming October 25, New Trailer Revealed At Summer Game Fest

description:
Palworld's massive update, the Sakurajima Update, was revealed during Summer Game Fest, bringing a new region, Pals, and much more on June 27. The update adds a new island, which appears to a have a number of different biomes, with a cherry blossom forrest and a mushroom filled swamp shown in the trailer.

There will also be new Pals, with a scary ghost and an armored knight shown off. There are also new sub species of existing Pals. Xbox players will be happy to know that dedicated servers are coming as part of the update as well.

The update will also add new buildings, an increased level cap, new raid, a new faction and boss, and a new stronghold, the oil rig, which is exactly what sounds like. There is also a new arena being added, which looks like it could be a 3v3 PvP mode.
title: Palworld Is Getting A New Region And So Much More With The Sakurajima Update

description:
It was a year ago at Summer Game Fest 2023 that we saw our first extended look at Alan Wake 2, and now, Remedy is back on Geoff Keighley's stage to give a first look at Night Springs, the first of two Alan Wake 2 expansions set for 2024.

In Night Springs, players will take on the role of three different characters, each inspired by characters from Remedy's past. This includes The Waitress, who looks like Rose Marigold; The Sibling, who looks like Control's Jesse Faden; and The Actor, who looks like Tim Breaker (but let's not beat around the bush--he also looks like Quantum Break's Jack Joyce.)

Across three "episodes" of Night Springs, players will live through a trio of Alan's failed attempts to get out of the Dark Place during his long stay there from 2010 to 2023. Check out the trailer for yourself, which, among other fun head-scratchers, seems to confirm Shawn Ashmore's character
title: Alan Wake 2 Night Springs DLC Launches This Week

description:
New World, the first game published by Amazon's gaming label, has built a strong and consistent player base on PC since its debut in 2021. Today, during Summer Game Fest Live with Geoff Keighley, Amazon Games announced that the action-RPG will journey to a new world of its own, as New World Aeternum will launch on PlayStation and Xbox on October 15.

New World Aeternum will bring the full New World experience--which includes the Rise Of The Angry Earth expansion that launched last year--to consoles, along with new Aeternum content.
title: New World Aeternum Brings Amazon's MMO To Xbox And PlayStation In October

description: Legos and Horizon come together as we see Aloy hunting dino machines. Players will not only hunt down Thunder Jaws, but even be able to craft a base. Lego Horizon Adventures releases holiday 2024.
title: Lego Horizon Adventures Cinematic Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2024

description:
Today, during Summer Game Fest, Uncapped Games--a new California-based studio made up of developers with real-time strategy experience--announced Battle Aces, an RTS that promises a full RTS experience in less time than it takes to eat a meal.

This new approach to RTS introduces a "Unit Deck" system, where players can preset a loadout of units and bases before dropping to battle. Over 50 units will be available to choose from at launch later this year, while 40 of them will be available in the upcoming closed beta test.
title: Battle Aces Is Real-Time Strategy With Matches Under 10 Minutes

description:
As part of Summer Game Fest, Nexon announced the release date for its free-to-play third-person shooter The First Descendant and published a brand-new trailer. The game launches on July 2 for PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

The First Descendant puts you in the armored boots of a titular Descendent as you fight back against the invading forces of The Vulgus, standing as humanity's last line of defense on the continent of Ingris. Take a look at the new trailer below.

The First Descendant was developed using Epic's Unreal Engine 5. Nexon held multiple beta tests for the game to gather feedback and data. The game was originally targeted to launch in 2023 before shifting to 2024.
title: The First Descendant Release Date Is Very Soon

description:
Davey Wreden, the creator of The Stanley Parable, has revealed his next game: Wanderstop. A dramatic shift from his previous work, Wanderstop appears to be a deconstruction of the cozy game genre.

From @IvyRoadGames, Wanderstop is a narrative-centric cozy game about change and tea. Playing as a fallen fighter named Alta, you’ll manage a tea shop and tend to the customers who pass through. Coming soon to PS5 & PC.

Wishlist now on Steam // https://t.co/7tnVzeX963 pic.twitter.com/yhO9uqCZ2d

— Annapurna Interactive (@A_i) June 7, 2024

Revealed at
title: The Stanley Parable Dev Reveals Upcoming Cozy-Turned-Dark Game Wanderstop

description:
The Power Rangers are getting the retro-brawler treatment with Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind. The new game from Digital Eclipse was announced at Summer Game Fest, with a very 1990s-fabulous trailer showing off tons of gameplay.

Rita's Rewind is very specifically set in the original era of Rangers, with their classic costumes, weapons, vehicles, and villains. That means we saw recognizable faces like Goldar and of course, Rita Repulsa in the trailer. The official announcement teases that this "Robo-Rita" is a reincarnation of the original, and she'll summon enemies from across Ranger history. The lengthy trailer showed side-scroller beat-'em-up action, vehicle segments, and first-person Zord battling.

"As we celebrate over 30 years of Power Rangers, we are excited to collaborate with Digital Eclipse to introduce Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind to our passionate fanbase," said Hasbro digital strategy SVP Eugene Evans, in the announcement. "
title: Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind Is A Retro TMNT-Style Brawler Coming In 2024
Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero Preorders Come With Bonus Playable Fighters

description:
Blumhouse Games had its own sizzle trailer during Summer Game Fest, announcing its involvement in six upcoming horror games, including one of the next projects from Sam Barlow and Half Mermaid. The final announcement in the trailer was for Project C, coming from Sam Barlow and Half Mermaid, who are working with Brandon Cronenberg, son of David Cronenberg and a horror filmmaker.

The teaser didn't include any gameplay from Project C, but it did include gameplay for five other titles. First was Crisol Theater of Idols, a first-person horror game featuring life-sized dolls and other monstrosities. After that was Grave Seasons, a pixel-art farming sim with horror elements. Third was Sleep A
title: Blumhouse Is Going All In On Horror Games, Including One From Sam Barlow And Brandon Cronenberg

description:
As part of Summer Game Fest, it was announced that Black Myth: Wukong has been delayed--but only on one platform. The game remains on track to release on August 20 for PC and PS5, but Xbox fans have to wait a while longer.

In a FAQ, developer Game Science said the Xbox Series X|S edition of the game does not currently meet its quality standards, so the team is spending more time optimizing. "We apologize for the delay and aim to minimize the wait for Xbox users. We will announce the release date as soon as it meets our quality standards," the company explained.

A new trailer for the game debuted during Summer Game Fest celebrating the fact that pre-orders are now available--check it out below.
title: Black Myth Wukong Delayed, But Only On One Platform

description:
Today during Summer Game Fest, SNK revealed the next two characters--one returning and one brand-new--for its upcoming fighter Fatal Fury: City Of The Wolves. The two additions, pirate captain B. Jenet and "street assassin" Vox Reaper, will increase the known roster to eight characters, with more to come before the game's early 2025 launch.

B. Jenet returns from 1999's Garou: Mark Of The Wolves--and, more recently, her appearance in The King Of Fighters XV--with a punishing kick-based offensive style. Her character trailer also shows off her ability to jump over low projectiles and follow up with a quick counter for big damage.

Vox Reaper, meanwhile, is the newest addition to the Fatal Fury universe. An assassin who was tasked with bringing down the previous game's villain Kain,
title: Newcomer Vox Reaper And Series Vet B. Jenet Join Fatal Fury: City Of The Wolves Roster

description:
Dragon Ball Sparking Zero's release date is officially confirmed with its new trailer, gameplay, character preorder bonuses, and more at Summer Game Fest. The Dragon Ball series has had dozens of games across multiple console generations as RPGs, arena fighters, card games, and this latest title will be releasing later this year in the fall.

Sparking Zero will have four different editions for purchase: Standard, Ultimate, Deluxe, and Premium Collector's Edition. Six characters are available as early-unlock preorder bonuses, with three characters being different iterations and power-ups of Vegito and Broly, respectively. Vegito will be getting Super Saiyan Blue and Broly is getting his Legendary Super Saiyan form, as well.

Sparking Zero will release on October 11 for the PS
title: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero Release Date Announced At Summer Game Fest

description:
Today, during Summer Game Fest, Capcom shocked Street Fighter 6 fans by announcing the full slate of characters coming via the game's Year 2 downloadable content. Even more shocking, the list includes the first-ever crossover characters in Street Fighter history: SNK's Terry Bogard and Mai Shiranui.

The brief teaser started with Luke and Jamie playing a video game together, while a mysterious figure wearing a white shirt and red vest approached the building they were in. From there, Terry, Mai, and SF veterans Elena and M. Bison were also confirmed for the next content pack.

This story is breaking...

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: SNK's Terry Bogard And Mai Shiranui Headline Street Fighter 6 Year 2 DLC

description:
Batman: Arkham Shadow returns us to the legendary Arkham universe, this time exclusively on Meta Quest 3, and the new VR game got its first story trailer during Summer Game Fest Live. In the trailer, we head back to Gotham City.

"There's a new darkness overtaking Gotham--driving the city mad," Bruce Wayne says in the official trailer. "The only light left is from the fire in the streets casting shadows of rats on everything that was once good."

We see mention of a "Rat King" at the police station, with Commissioner Gordon clearly very frustrated about his lack of progress on the case. The trailer is set to an instrumental cover of "Bullet With Butterfly Wings" by The Smashing Pumpkins, and despite all his rage, Gordon can't put that rat in a cage.
title: Batman: Arkham Shadow Story Trailer Pits Bat Against Rat
Star Wars Outlaws Preorders - A Breakdown Of The Numerous Exclusive Editions And Bonuses

description: Escape prison with your friends by equipping tools, evading guards, and executing your breakout plan. Destructible environments, proximity chat, a multitude of escape routes, and 20 player lobbies!
title: CUFFBUST Official Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2024

description:
A sequel to Aerial Knight's Never Yield has been announced during IGN Live, appropriately titled We Never Yield. We Never Yield builds upon and continues the story of the game's previous entry alongside adding new features that were not present in the game's previous entry such as voice-acting and local multiplayer.

We Never Yield continues the story of Wally and Lone, twin brothers who were destined to receive their family treasure. This time around, Wally and Lone will be attempting to work together to resolve their issues from the previous entry. "You do not see a lot of Black characters resolving trauma with each other," developer Neil Jones said. With dual protagonists, players can still play solo, but the game becomes easier by playing with another person, where players can use two separate controllers or have half of a portion of the controller or buttons assigned to that individual.

Even though We Never Yield is a sequel, players do not need to play the previous
title: Persona Meets Sonic The Hedgehog With Aerial Knight's We Never Yield

description:
At long last, Macross Plus fans can look forward to a new Blu-ray release of the cult-classic anime series. Better known as Robotech in the west, the anime series was sidelined for decades due to a legal feud between Bigwest and Studio Nue against Harmony Gold, the US company that licensed Macross in the '80s.

After a lengthy period of negotiation between the parties involved ended with a new deal being reached in 2021, and at MCM Comic-Con London, Anime Limited announced plans to release a
title: Cult Classic Anime Macross Plus Is Finally Releasing On Blu-Ray In The West

description:
Way back in the day, Xur, the Exotics vendor who only shows up in Destiny 2 on the weekends, required you to pay for his spiffy wares in a currency called Strange Coins. In Destiny 2, Strange Coins went away, only popping up later as part of the Dares of Eternity activity. With the currency changes that came with The Final Shape, you'll start finding Strange Coins in your pocket again, and you'll need them to buy stuff from Xur again.

The thing is, it's not immediately clear where you can get Strange Coins from in the game. You'll need a lot of them to buy stuff from Xur, as everything he sells, from Exotic weapons and armor to Legendary gear, requires Strange Coins. Here's what we know about Strange Coins and how to earn them. You might also want to check out our guide to
title: How To Earn Strange Coins In Destiny 2: The Final Shape

description:
If you were to ask a group of gamers which video game world they want to live in, many would probably say Stardew Valley. Its relaxing farm sim gameplay and charming NPCs make it easy to rack up huge playtime counts. And with The Official Stardew Valley Cookbook, which released in May, fans can now recreate a part of the Stardew Valley experience in real life. The fittingly adorable hardcover book is on sale for $19.58 (was $28), which is 30% off list price.

The Official Stardew Valley Cookbook
title: New Stardew Valley Cookbook By ConcernedApe Gets Huge Discount At Amazon

description:
Very few people have been in the video game industry as long as Mark Cerny, the architect of Sony's PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. Cerny got his start at Atari in the '80s, and he's seen just about everything in the four decades that followed. That's why it's encouraging to hear that Cerny doesn't believe that consoles are on the way out in an era where PC gamers are getting titles that were once PlayStation exclusives.

"I think as long as we continue to create that very nice package, the future of consoles is pretty bright," explained Cerny during an interview with GamesIndustry.biz. Cerny is also adamant that Sony isn't trying to make PlayStations into inexpensive PCs.

The downward slop of consoles includes Sony's recent admission that PlayStation 5 sales won'
title: PlayStation 5 Architect Sees Bright Future For Consoles

description:
Activision has confirmed more details on Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, and specifically a Hollywood actor who is playing a role in the game. Y'Lan Noel, who starred on the TV series Insecure and the movie The First Purge, is lending his voice to a new character in Black Ops 6.

Activision marketing boss Tyler Bahl confirmed this to Variety, saying Noel is playing an unspecified character seen in the game's key art. That's all the company would confirm about the character, but more details are expected to be divulged during the Black Ops 6 Direct on Sunday, June 9.

For now, Bahl said
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Features This Hollywood Actor As A New Character

description:
With the launch of The Final Shape this week and the Salvation's Edge raid, several big changes have been made to Destiny 2. One thing that does remain a constant is Xur, as the friendly arms dealer is ready to offer Exotic and Legendary-class weapons to anyone looking to triumph in the Pale Heart. While you can check our Final Shape guides hub for help, it never hurts to see what the arms dealer has for sale. Here's where you can find Xur this week and what he has for sale.

This week you can find Xur in The Tower, inside the Hangar. For his weapons, Xur is offering the Sunshot and Jotu
title: Where Is Xur Today? (June 7-11) Destiny 2 Exotic Items And Xur Location Guide

description:
A hypothetical Bloodborne 2 is arguably one of the most-requested gaming sequels of our current era, and Sony and From Software have left fans out in the cold for years. Now, the upcoming 3D platformer Astro Bot will offer a Bloodborne-themed skin in its digital deluxe edition, which is a bit cruel for those who have been waiting almost a decade for a sequel.

As shown over at PlayStation Blog, the
title: A Bit Of Bloodborne Is Coming To PS5, But Not In The Way Fans Want

description: Introducing the new official PIONER trailer - "Anomaly", a 1st person action mmorpg.
title: PIONER Official Anomaly Gameplay Trailer

description:
Gen V actor Chance Perdomo tragically passed away earlier this year in a motorcycle accident, just before Season 2 was due to begin filming. The producers said they would take their time to "recraft" the Season 2 storylines in the wake of Perdomo's death, subsequently saying they would not recast Perdomo's character, Andre Anderson. Now we know how Gen V will handle Perdomo's death in Season 2.

Eric Kripke, who created The Boys and also works on Gen V, told TV Line (via Collider) that instead of replacing Perdomo with someone new playing Andre Ander
title: How Gen V Will Handle Chance Perdomo's Death In Season 2

description:
Prime Video's TV show The Boys returns for its fourth season on June 16, and it will contain the scariest sequence in the series so far. That's according to The Boys creator Eric Kripke, who told SFX Magazine that Season 4 has some intense sequences that fans won't soon forget.

"There is certain imagery, for sure, this season, that you'll never be able to get out of your eyeballs," Kripke said.

This is a bold statement to make given The Boys Seasons 1-3 have featured many intense and grotesque sequences. The Season 3 episode "Herogasm"--which depicted superheroes having group sex and using their powers--comes to mind when thinking about sequences from The Boys that are hard to forget.
title: The Boys Season 4 Has Scariest Sequence In Series So Far, Creator Says

description:
Earlier this week, Warner Bros. Discovery announced an abrupt price increase for Max just days ahead of the House of the Dragon Season 2 premiere (for more, check out our House of the Dragon Season 2 review). While that move wasn't very popular, WBD has now revealed that Max is also getting a new free-trial subscription, but only for a limited time.

The biggest catch for the free trial is that it's only available for new customers. Current and lapsed Max subscribers are not eligible. Additionally, the free trial will only last seven days from the initial setup. Anything after seven days w
title: Max Finally Gets A Free Trial Subscription, But Only For A Limited Time

description:
Silent Hill creator Keiichirō Toyoma and Bokeh Game Studio's debut horror game, Slitterhead, will launch on November 8 for PC, PS4, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

A new gameplay trailer was leaked early and revealed the release date. The trailer shows an interesting mix of concepts. It's set in Japan with supernatural creatures, reminiscent of Ghostwire: Tokyo. However, instead of first-person, Slitterhead is in third-person. You can also possess what seem to be NPCs to fight against supernatural creatures in a similar manner to the Dishonored games.

It appears to play like a third-person action-adventure game where you can swap between different characters on the fly while in combat, similar to the Final Fantasy VII Remake games. There's also a variety of different physical and magical tools at your disposal, including claws, rifles, and even gatling guns.
title: Slitterhead Launches In November, Gameplay Trailer Leaks Ahead Of SGF

description:
While the popular theory was that 2K Games would unveil Borderlands 4 at Summer Game Fest, it now seems likely that Sid Meier's Civilization VII will be the major game revealed by the company later today.

Insider Gaming noted that a banner for Civilization VII popped up for a brief time on the 2K Games website earlier today. However, it has been removed at time of this publication, though can be seen below. The report adds that content creators and some media members are aware of an announcement for the title as well.

Civilization VII Banner Appears on 2K Games Website Ahead of Summer Game Festhttps://t.co/HIX5UmlYFJ

— Insider Gaming (@InsiderGamingIG)
title: Civilization 7 Leaks Ahead Of Summer Game Fest

description:
After years of expansions and seasonal content, Destiny 2: The Final Shape has arrived. The latest expansion to the game introduces a new campaign that unfolds across a series of missions, all focused on preventing the Witness from enacting its plan to reduce the universe to a state of eternal stillness.

Can the Guardians and the rest of the coalition forces save the day in time? That's a question that can only be answered by playing the game, and if you're looking to dive in, here's a list of every mission in The Final Shape campaign:

Destiny 2: The Final Shape missions

  • Transmigration
  • Temptation
  • Exegesis
  • Requiem
  • Ascent
  • Dissent
  • Iconoclasm

Similar to previous Destiny 2 expansions, that's a handful of missions to work your way through, although each one is fairly len
title: Destiny 2: The Final Shape Campaign Missions List And How Long To Beat

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will launch on Xbox Game Pass, meaning subscribers can play the game at no extra cost. This is a big change for the series, and many are wondering how it will all shake out for consumers and for the Xbox business. All of this remains to be seen, but analyst Piers Harding-Rolls has now weighed in with his thoughts on how the move could shake things up, including how the move could be a "concern" for Sony.

He said in a piece published on GI.biz that Black Ops 6 on Game Pass will encourage people to sign up for Game Pass and bring lapsed subscribers back into the fold, and that most of the new subscribers will sign up for Game Pass Ultimate or PC Game Pass.

Putting a big game like Black Ops 6 on Game Pass will no doubt be "
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 On Game Pass Could Be A "Concern" For Sony, Analyst Says

description:
[UPDATE] The writer of the story, Kurakasis, has walked back some of their reporting on Borderlands 4. The report now says it's no longer a given that Borderlands 4 will be announced at Summer Game Fest.

"I wasn't able to verify this information to a satisfactory degree but still requested its publication. The information I received this week may suggest that Borderlands 4 could be announced soon, but I'm not sure anymore if it will happen at SGF," they said. "I made a mistake and apologize to @XputerE, which trusted me based on the accuracy of my previous 'leaks', to eXputer's readers, and to everyone who came across this news. I believe it was important to clarify the situation ahead of time so readers are not misled."

I decided to publish information, as seen on eXputer forums, that Borderlands 4 would be announced at the Summer Game Fest too early, an
title: Borderlands 4 Might Not Be Announced At SGF After All

description:
Nintendo has added five classic Game Boy games to its core Nintendo Switch Online membership, all featuring Mega Man. The games include Mega Man: Dr. Wily's Revenge, Mega Man II, Mega Man III, Mega Man IV, and Mega Man V.

The five Game Boy Mega Man titles are a curious mix of remake and new content, with each game featuring its own original storyline, but reusing bosses, enemies, and stage components from the original NES titles. Each of the Game Boy games mixes up content from two of the NES titles, except for Mega Man V, which has all-original content.

Five classic games featuring the Blue Bomber are now available to play for #NintendoSwitchOnline members!
title: Nintendo Switch Online Gets 5 Mega Man Titles From The Game Boy
Astro Bot Preorders Are Live - The PS5 Exclusive Comes With An Adorable Bonus

description: Super Mario RPG has dropped to its lowest price yet at Amazon and Walmart. A modernized version of Mario's debut role-playing game, Super Mario RPG is discounted to only $39. Switch exclusives rarely drop below $40--especially Mario games that are still fairly new. The enhanced version of the Super Nintendo classic released on Switch last November. Though Switch owners may currently be preoccupied with
title: Super Mario RPG Is Less Than $40 At Amazon Right Now
